data.title: Demand Response Integration Through Agent-Based Coordination of Consumers in Virtual Power Plants

tldr.text: A multi-agent based Virtual Power Plant design that is able to balance the demand of energy-intensive, industrial loads with the supply situation in the electricity grid.
